Notes:  Have tried out links using Calibre for epub, Kindle and MobipocketReader on the desktop PC. For the mobi file I tried out the links using Aldiko, Moon+Reader for the epub file and Kindle for mobi on a Samsung Note 10.1 (2012 model)

For users of Kindle for PC. Had a good look online. Many people made comments about not being able to enlarge pictures in Kindle for PC. The application mobipocket reader is  a good alternative. It is great for zooming in on pictures.

For Calibre you can right click on pictures and select View Image.


Enjoy.
